availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas M. Slaton (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Slaton. Father of Summer T. Slaton, Elizabeth A. Slaton, Virgil M. Slaton, Mary C. Slaton, Irene L. Slaton, and Sarah N. Slaton. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 61B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 809.
"Thomas Milton Slaton (1817-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #68304150, accessed January 18, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/68304150.
